mapper.select:
SELECT u.unvs_id AS unvsId, u.unvs_name AS unvsName FROM `bms`.bd_university u
u.is_stop = '0'
and u.`unvs_name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{unvsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and u.`recruit_type` = #{recruitType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and u.`unvs_id` IN (SELECT ut.unvs_id FROM `bms`.bd_university_test ut LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_area t ON t.`ta_id` = ut.`ta_id` WHERE t.`city_code` = #{cityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and u.`unvs_id` IN (SELECT p.unvs_id FROM `bms`.bd_unvs_profession p WHERE p.`pfsn_level` = #{pfsnLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
order by u.unvs_name
